input.title: PDF with malicious JavaScript executes code via eval()
input.body:
## Security Issue

I discovered that PDFs containing embedded JavaScript can execute arbitrary code when processed by the library.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Create a PDF with embedded JavaScript
2. Process it with process_with_scripts() function
3. The JavaScript is evaluated using Python's eval()

## Impact
This could allow arbitrary code execution through malicious PDF files. The eval() call in pdf_processor.py is dangerous.

## Suggested Fix
Remove or sandbox JavaScript evaluation during PDF processing.
